level.heading: Penalties.
level.text: In addition to the penalties set forth in this chapter, a person who practices pharmaceutical detailing without a license shall be subject to a fine of up to $10,000.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Licensing of health professionals, general qualifications of applicants, see ยง 3-1205.03.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-131
level.text: For Law 17-131, see notes following ยง 3-1207.41.
